title.narrative: Bolstering Health Systems and Security in LMICs - motivated by COVID-19

description.narrative: In an effort to inform LMIC governments, members of the development community, and other stakeholders responding to the ongoing pandemic, CGD experts will produce knowledge products outlining and urging greater policy coherence among multilateral institutions, LMIC governments, bilateral donors, and the broader global health community in the response to COVID-19. Throughout the grant period, CGD’s work will focus on strengthening the resiliency of the global health system more broadly and preparing for future pandemics.

title.narrative: CGD continues to examine and socialize innovative ways to develop, scale, and deliver a COVID-19 vaccine in developing countries by conducting cutting-edge analysis and engaging with officials in governments, as well as multilateral agencies, industry leaders, NGOs, and other stakeholders throughout the grant period.

By coordinating with decisionmakers in high income countries and LMICs, CGD analysis and outreach helps to inform policies related to vaccine development and distribution efforts, with a focus on ensuring equitable global access and affordability.
